contentfulBlogPost.title: We’re Launching a new Open Hardware Creators in Academia Fellowship

childMarkdownRemark.html: Thank you to the Alfred P. Sloan Foundation for the program funding to make the Open Hardware Creators in Academia Fellowship possible.

Fellows will be introduced to mentors or collaborators from industry with relevant expertise. The Fellowship will build a beneficial network to share work being done, ask questions, and gain feedback from each other. Each Fellow’s documentation will be a valuable piece of the resource library produced within this Fellowship.
